items.name: Remedy
items.description: Healing sorcery of Yulva, Sealer of New Londo. Used to reduce poison and bleeding.

items.name: Artorias' Greatsword
items.description: Abysswalker's cursed blade. Scales with Strength, Dexterity, Faith and Intelligence.

items.name: Fire Keeper Soul
items.description: Gnawed by infinite humanity. Upgrades Estus Flask or provides souls.

items.name: Big Hat Logan
items.description: Former Vinheim scholar who sought Seath's knowledge. Sells advanced sorceries.

items.name: Seath the Scaleless
items.description: Treacherous dragon granted dukedom by Gwyn. Drops the Bequeathed Lord Soul Shard.

items.name: Crestfallen Warrior
items.description: Defeated Undead at Firelink Shrine. Provides cynical commentary on the quest.

items.name: New Londo Ruins
items.description: Flooded city that sacrificed its people to contain the Abyss.

items.name: Chaos Servant Covenant
items.description: Servants of the Fair Lady. Offers Chaos pyromancies at high ranks.

items.name: Anor Londo
items.description: City of the gods bathed in eternal sunlight (illusion). Home of Gwynevere and Gwyndolin.

items.name: Bloodbite Ring
items.description: Reduces bleed buildup. One of the protective rings granted by the gods.

items.name: Priscilla's Dagger
items.description: Curved blade of the Painted World's crossbreed. Inflicts bleed damage.

items.name: Quelana of Izalith
items.description: Surviving daughter of the Witch of Izalith. Teaches advanced pyromancies.

items.name: Darkmoon Blade Covenant
items.description: Gwyndolin's blades who punish the guilty. Grants the Darkmoon Blade miracle.

items.name: Gravelord Sword
items.description: Nito's toxic-infested blade. Causes toxic buildup on enemies.

items.name: Manus, Father of the Abyss
items.description: Primeval human whose wild humanity created the Abyss. Drops Humanity sprites.

items.name: Dusk of Oolacile
items.description: Rescued princess who teaches Oolacile's lost sorceries.

items.name: Solaire of Astora
items.description: Warrior of Sunlight seeking his own sun. Available for co-op summoning.

items.name: Velka's Talisman
items.description: Allows casting of both miracles and sorceries. Associated with the goddess of sin.

items.name: Painted World of Ariamis
items.description: Prison for forbidden things. Contains Crossbreed Priscilla and occult weapons.

items.name: Gwyn, Lord of Cinder
items.description: Final boss who linked the First Flame. His soul can rekindle the Age of Fire.

items.name: Havel's Ring
items.description: Increases maximum equip load by 50%. Worn by Havel's warriors to carry heavy armor.

items.name: Crest Shield
items.description: Magic-resistant shield from Astora. Blocks 80% of magic damage.

items.name: Laurentius of the Great Swamp
items.description: Pyromancy trainer in Firelink Shrine. Goes hollow if sent to Blighttown unprepared.

items.name: Sunlight Medal
items.description: Proof of co-op victories. Used to rank up in Warriors of Sunlight covenant.

items.name: Iron Tarkus
items.description: Legendary knight summonable for Iron Golem fight. Wields greatsword and tower shield.

items.name: Witch Beatrice
items.description: Sorceress summonable for Moonlight Butterfly and Four Kings fights.

items.name: The Abyss
items.description: Formless void that causes instant death without Covenant of Artorias ring.

items.name: The Fair Lady
items.description: Quelaag's sister who absorbs poison. Leader of Chaos Servant covenant.

items.name: Sif, the Great Grey Wolf
items.description: Artorias' loyal wolf companion. Guards his grave in Darkroot Garden.

items.name: Oolacile Township
items.description: Ruined city consumed by the Abyss. Setting for Artorias of the Abyss DLC.

items.name: Undead Burg
items.description: Early game area overrun with hollows. Teaches core game mechanics.

items.name: Lautrec of Carim
items.description: Golden-armored knight who kills Fire Keepers. Drops Favor and Protection ring.

items.name: Chaos Flame
items.description: Corrupted flame that created demons. Source of Chaos weapons and pyromancies.

items.name: Moonlight Greatsword
items.description: Seath's crystalline blade. Scales with Intelligence. Obtained by cutting his tail.

items.name: Gravelord Nito
items.description: First of the Dead. Drops the Lord Soul needed to open Kiln of the First Flame.

items.name: The Kiln of the First Flame
items.description: Final area where Gwyn waits. Where the Age of Fire began.

items.name: Dark Sign
items.description: Brand of the Undead. Causes respawning at bonfires after death.

items.name: Frampt
items.description: Guides the Chosen Undead to link the Fire. Accepts souls for items.

items.name: Kaathe
items.description: Reveals truth about Dark Lord ending. Leader of Darkwraith covenant.

items.name: Darkwraith Covenant
items.description: Invade other worlds to steal humanity. Grants Dark Hand and Red Eye Orb.

items.name: Vagrant
items.description: Rare creatures that spawn from lost items in other players' worlds.

items.name: Ingward
items.description: Last Sealer of New Londo. Sells curse-resistant items and spells.

items.name: Demon Firesage
items.description: Corrupted witch-turned-demon. Optional boss in Demon Ruins.

items.name: Shiva of the East
items.description: Eastern merchant who betrays the player. Sells katanas and unique weapons.

items.name: Symbol of Avarice
items.description: Mimic head that boosts soul gain by 50% but drains HP.

items.name: Crossbreed Priscilla
items.description: Half-dragon resident of Painted World. Wields Lifehunt scythe.

items.name: Gwyndolin
items.description: Illusion-weaving son of Gwyn. Leader of Darkmoon Blade covenant.

items.name: Dreg Heap
items.description: Collapsed timelines and kingdoms. Shows the end result of fire-linking cycles.

items.name: Humanity
items.description: Fragment of Dark Soul. Reverses hollowing, kindles bonfires, enables multiplayer.

items.name: The Chosen Undead
items.description: Bearer of the Darksign. Decides the fate of the Age of Fire.
